subject: Broken SIMSONN Plus X Pedals with haptic reactors
description_text:
Hello, I have recently purchased you're pedals and I have to say I was very pleased with the way they performed. Though after only 2 weeks of use I have had many problems. Firstly the throttle has broke and the spring has come loose and therefore there is no input being register on the Simsonn app. As well as a part holding the loadcell pedals completely giving out while driving. I am always sure to be gentle with my gear so I don't feel i'm at fault. As well as having a travel problem on the clutch appear after a week of use. I would really appreciate a new set of pedals as I realise that your brand seems to be reliable with many other positive reviews and I just don't have the money to afford a new set/send them back to you. I have attached an image below of the load cell issue. Thanks.
[cid:e47713fb-8b2a-4ffc-ab12-0dcc069798e8]

conversations.body_text: Hi Evan McKenna,  We sincerely apologize for the breakage of the plastic part on your throttle pedal. We will promptly send you a replacement part for quick installation. Previously, we used metal parts, but considering potential interference in customers’ environments, we switched to a non-metal material to isolate the bracket from affecting the sensor. Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and shipping address, and we will send the replacement part tomorrow.
